name: express-back-end
description: Boilerplate for the Express backend in an Express-React project
author: garrettgsb

scripts.reset: psql -U development -d teams < ./db/migrations/01_schema.sql && psql -U development -d teams < ./db/migrations/02_schema.sql && psql -U development -d teams < ./db/seeds/01_Users.sql && psql -U development -d teams < ./db/seeds/02_Jobs.sql && psql -U development -d teams < ./db/seeds/03_Tasks.sql && psql -U development -d teams < ./db/seeds/04_Assignments.sql && psql -U development -d teams < ./db/seeds/05_Skills.sql && psql -U development -d teams < ./db/seeds/06_requirements.sql
